name: Two Button Twist
description:
So You Love Your Keyboard

Well, I will see to that

Two Button Twist is a game which lives up to its name, use the two arrow keys to control a stupid square across some stupid levels (in a stupid game made by a stupid person).

Play across 9 incredibly buggy levels with no variety, i can already see this game winning a BAFTA.

I recommend playing the Windows version of the game, as the Web version is quite buggy Controls

The Left and the Right Arrow Key (not A or D you dum)

A Submission to the Two Button Game Jam
